title:
Tell me about the camp which used to be off camp wright road adjacent to oleander memorial gardens.

was it a boy scout camp?



Also was there ever an airplane landing strip in Seagage near intersetion os oleander and greenville sound road?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=6968 We're still searching for the answer to your question about Camp Wright. It does not appear to have been a Boy Scout camp.
